data.title: Tesla May Have Launched Energy Plan To Help Reduce Electricity Rates
data.text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) is known for more than its cars. The company also produces solar panels and batteries, designs computer chips, and writes self-driving software.

data.title: Short Sellers Falling In and Out of Love With Electric Vehicle Makers
data.text: Short interest moves among automakers' stocks were evenly split during the two-week reporting period that ended on October 15.

data.title: Tesla Shanghai Factory Has Already Achieved Impressive Scale
data.text: The new factory has ramped up to significant production volumes, aiding the electric-car maker's growth story.

data.title: Lithium Junior Miner News For The Month Of October 2020
data.text: Lithium prices were flat for the past month. Leading equity research firm “calls the bottom” on lithium pricing. Lithium market news - White House Executive Order on critical minerals, declares national emergency. Biden campaign tells miners it supports domestic production of EV metals.

data.title: Tesla Reports Improved Miles-To-Accidents Ratio For Autopilot
data.text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) has released its “Vehicle Safety Report” for the third-quarter that contains figures related to accidents per mile involving the automaker's vehicles with autopilot engaged and disengaged.  What Happened: In Q3, the Elon Musk-led company registered one accident for every 4.59 million miles where drivers engaged the Autopilot, as per the report.
